articles.author: Gina Heeb, Peter Rudegeair
articles.title: Exclusive | Capital One Strikes $5.15 Billion Deal for Fintech Brex - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Deal gives credit-card issuer access to technology used by thousands of companies for corporate credit cards
articles.content:
Capital One FinancialCOF1.76%increase; green up pointing triangle
agreed to buy the fintech Brex for $5.15 billion in cash and stock, in a deal that could give the credit-card issuer more firepower … [+377 chars]
